children.structure_process: 1. Data Collection → 2. Problem Identification → 3. Hypothesis Generation → 4. Diagnostic Testing → 5. Diagnosis → 6. Treatment Planning → 7. Follow-up and Reflection

children.examples: General Practice Consultation, Emergency Case Workup, Case-Based Medical School Exams

children.terminology: 1. Data Collection → Patient history, physical examination, and initial information gathering
2. Problem Identification → Recognizing and prioritizing clinical problems
3. Hypothesis Generation → Formulating possible explanations or diagnoses
4. Diagnostic Testing → Ordering and interpreting investigations
5. Diagnosis → Establishing the most likely cause
6. Treatment Planning → Creating and choosing management strategies
7. Follow-up and Reflection → Monitoring outcomes and learning from the process
